snippet.title: Poly Ego: VR Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome, test subjects, to your tests!

The game is now available on Oculus Store for PCVR:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/6326787440742753/

It's coming soon on Steam, Quest, and Viveport!

In order to advance yourself in line with the other robots, you've got to pass these tests first! Do so and your life will change, forever!

Until then, enjoy your freedom in prison! Do your best to escape and try not to waste too much time, we've got an eternity of it!

"Poly Ego" is a Puzzle VR experience created by Poly Tool Design.

Credits:
Music by Psychronic from Pixabay
https://pixabay.com/users/psychronic-13092015/?utm_source=link-attribution&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=music&utm_content=21858
